org.apache.pig.newplan

Class FilterExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.newplan.FilterExtractor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PartitionFilterExtractor, PredicatePushDownFilterExtractor

    public abstract class FilterExtractor
extends Object
    Extracts filter predicates for interfaces implementing LoadPredicatePushdown
